sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Add SNAssetManagement discovery source</description> <name>Add SNAssetManagement source</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var dsUtil = new global.CMDBDataSourceUtil(); dsUtil.addDataSource("SNAssetManagement");]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-09-25 00:44:21</sys_created_on> <sys_id>08e533800f2310108397fc91ff767e4d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Add SNAssetManagement source</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Configuration Management (CMDB)" source="com.snc.cmdb">c60efc0f6d2220100acb70b3534330c0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_08e533800f2310108397fc91ff767e4d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-09-25 00:44:21</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
